<?php
require_once('/wordpress/wp-load.php');
require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/plugin.php');

// Define base URL for images
$base_url = '/playground/images';

// Create categories
$categories = [
    'mens' => 'Men',
    'womens' => 'Women',
    'kids' => 'Kids',
    'shoes' => 'Shoes'
];

foreach ($categories as $slug => $name) {
    if (!term_exists($slug, 'product_cat')) {
        wp_insert_term($name, 'product_cat', ['slug' => $slug]);
    }
}

// Define products
$products = [
    [
        'name' => 'Minimalist Performance Shoes',
        'description' => 'Lightweight performance shoes designed for maximum comfort and agility.',
        'price' => 129.99,
        'category' => 'shoes',
        'image' => $base_url . '/products/minimalist-performance.jpeg',
        'gallery' => [
            $base_url . '/products/minimalist-performance.jpeg'
        ]
    ],
    [
        'name' => 'Minimalist Training Shoes',
        'description' => 'Versatile training shoes perfect for gym and outdoor workouts.',
        'price' => 119.99,
        'category' => 'shoes',
        'image' => $base_url . '/products/minimalist-training.jpeg',
        'gallery' => [
            $base_url . '/products/minimalist-training.jpeg'
        ]
    ],
    [
        'name' => 'Minimalist Street Shoes',
        'description' => 'Stylish street shoes combining comfort with urban aesthetics.',
        'price' => 109.99,
        'category' => 'shoes',
        'image' => $base_url . '/products/minimalist-street.jpeg',
        'gallery' => [
            $base_url . '/products/minimalist-street.jpeg'
        ]
    ]
];

// Create products
foreach ($products as $product_data) {
    $product = new WC_Product_Simple();
    $product->set_name($product_data['name']);
    $product->set_description($product_data['description']);
    $product->set_regular_price($product_data['price']);
    
    // Set category
    $term = get_term_by('slug', $product_data['category'], 'product_cat');
    if ($term) {
        wp_set_object_terms($product->get_id(), $term->term_id, 'product_cat');
    }
    
    // Set featured image
    $image_id = media_sideload_image($product_data['image'], $product->get_id(), '', 'id');
    if (!is_wp_error($image_id)) {
        $product->set_image_id($image_id);
    }
    
    // Set gallery images
    $gallery_ids = [];
    foreach ($product_data['gallery'] as $image_url) {
        $gallery_id = media_sideload_image($image_url, $product->get_id(), '', 'id');
        if (!is_wp_error($gallery_id)) {
            $gallery_ids[] = $gallery_id;
        }
    }
    if (!empty($gallery_ids)) {
        $product->set_gallery_image_ids($gallery_ids);
    }
    
    $product->save();
}
